headline: WM Announces 10% Dividend Rate Increase for 2025
summary: HOUSTON, December 16, 2024--WM (NYSE: WM) today announced that its Board of Directors has approved a 10.0% increase in the planned quarterly dividend rate for 2025, from $0.75 to $0.825 per share. This increase brings the annual dividend rate to $3.30 per share, up from $3.00, and marks the company’s twenty-second consecutive year of dividend increases.
